snippet.title: New exhibit blends art, history, and science
snippet.description: ...The Huntington Library opened a permanent exhibit on November 1st that masterfully displays the roots of modern science, going back as far as the first century, to Ptolemys model of the heavens. Ars took a firsthand look at the new Dibner Hall of the History of Science during its press preview...

snippet.title: Browser history hijack + social networks = lost anonymity
snippet.description: ...Simply joining a few groups at social networking sites may reveal enough information for hackers to personally identify you, according to some recent computer science research. In a paper that will be presented at a security conference later this year, an international team of academics describes how they were able to build membership sets using information that social networking sites make avail...
